ygData.subject: Re: the soerbaird - question and or sick of hearing about it
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Sheesh! Now this is a rant. Not much point in having a training academy for bards and the making everything taught in class available for free to the
ygData.messageBody:
>Is all the actual nuts and bolts information you have
>compiled about bards locked behind passworded sections
>marked "Members Only"?
>
>I may be an idiot and unable to find the information I am
>actually interested in (specific tactics, song effects,
>bard quests, bard only magic items, bard faction information)
>and if so I apologize.
>
>But if I am correct that all such information is secreted away,
>then I have heard enough about the clique known as
>the soerbairds. If y'all want to go have your private little
>group and harvest a bunch of information which you then keep
>to yourself, then I for one don't want to hear the
>name of your clubby club on this list again. Any information
>that I am able to unearth about the bard profession is
>public knowledge as far as I'm concerned and I would be happy
>to have it repeated to any struggling or curious bard out there.

Sheesh! Now this is a rant. Not much point in having a training
academy for bards and the making everything taught in class available
for free to the general public. I suppose you think that colleges
should do away with tuition and provide their classes to everyone for
free because you can research it yourself at the public library?

As I have said before, I have no connection with the Soerbairds and
have never even met one of their members. Their posts, however, are
informative, helpfull, well written, and never disparage others the
way that you have sir! All of my friends report that the Bards they
have met from this guild have been kind and helpfull to all and the
organisation is a blessing to the realm of Norrath.

Why are you bashing a group like this that you know so little about?
Save such lowly behaviour for those only fit to entertain drunkards
and tavern wenches.

Zendarin
The Wandering Minstrel
